captions.text:
Selena Gomez is redefining what
it means to be a
public figure in 2024. She
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
is no longer just a
Disney alumna.
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
Exactly. Between her billionaire status
and her advocacy, she is
showing immense accountability. Her Rare
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
Impact Fund aims to raise
one hundred million dollars for
mental health services, funded partly
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
by one percent of Rare
Beauty sales.
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
That commitment to mental health
is personal. She has been
open about her bipolar diagnosis
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
and the physical toll of
lupus. In a recent Hollywood
Reporter interview, she discussed the
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
grief of learning she cannot
safely carry her own children.
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
It is that vulnerability that
connects her to fans. Even
her relationship with Benny Blanco
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
has faced public scrutiny, but
she has set firm boundaries,
defending her personal choices as
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
She’s also shining professionally. At
the Academy Museum Gala, she
looked every bit the classic
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
Hollywood star. With Only Murders
in the Building renewed for
season five and her film
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
Emilia Pérez receiving rave reviews,
her career is incredibly stable.
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
She is proving you can
manage a massive business while
pursuing challenging art. She is
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
choosing her own path and
her own future.
captions.speaker: B

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: Selena Gomez is redefining what it means to be a public figure in 2024. She is no longer just a Disney alumna.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: Exactly. Between her billionaire status and her advocacy, she is showing immense accountability. Her Rare Impact Fund aims to raise one hundred million dollars for mental health services, funded partly by one percent of Rare Beauty sales.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: That commitment to mental health is personal. She has been open about her bipolar diagnosis and the physical toll of lupus. In a recent Hollywood Reporter interview, she discussed the grief of learning she cannot safely carry her own children.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: It is that vulnerability that connects her to fans. Even her relationship with Benny Blanco has faced public scrutiny, but she has set firm boundaries, defending her personal choices as an adult.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: She’s also shining professionally. At the Academy Museum Gala, she looked every bit the classic Hollywood star. With Only Murders in the Building renewed for season five and her film Emilia Pérez receiving rave reviews, her career is incredibly stable.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: She is proving you can manage a massive business while pursuing challenging art. She is choosing her own path and her own future.
